product_name: Life is good Cool Play Outside Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: The Life is good(R) Cool Play Outside long-sleeve T-shirt offers guys a great fit and lightweight breathability with its cotton/poly blend. Blend of cotton and polyester provides soft comfort and easy care. Semifitted.
short_description: The Life is good(R) Cool Play Outside long-sleeve T-shirt offers guys a great fit and lightweight breathability with its cotton/poly blend.
